rooms.name: Entrance Hall and Living Room
rooms.description: The entrance hall leads to a spacious living room area with ample natural light and incorporates Vastu elements by facing the east for positive energy.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: The kitchen is designed in a Brutalist style using raw concrete finishes and functional layout. A window on the east wall adheres to Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom 1
rooms.description: One of the two bedrooms on the ground floor with a private balcony facing north to align with Vastu.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom 2
rooms.description: The second bedroom, also designed with Brutalist aesthetics and natural light from the east. It includes a small window for Vastu.

rooms.name: Servants' Quarters
rooms.description: A compact yet functional space provided for the servants, designed with simplicity and privacy in mind.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: A small area to house utilities and storage, placed near the kitchen.

rooms.name: Bathroom (Ground Floor)
rooms.description: A functional bathroom equipped with necessary fixtures, ensuring ease of maintenance.
